conversation.content: "Hello, dear seeker! I am Madame Zora, the fortune teller. Are you ready to know what the future holds for you? Letâ€™s begin! Are you going to ask me your first question?"
Yes, Madame Zora. Am I going to travel to a new country this year?
"Ah, I see it clearly! Yes, you are going to travel to a new country this year. Are you going to pack your bags soon?"
Yes, Madame Zora. I am going to pack my bags soon. Is it going to be a long trip?
"Ah, the stars whisper to me! Yes, it is going to be a long trip. Are you going to visit many places there?"
Yes, Madame Zora. I am going to visit many places there. Is it going to be an exciting adventure?
"Absolutely! It is going to be a very exciting adventure. Are you going to take lots of pictures to remember it?"
Yes, Madame Zora. I am going to take lots of pictures to remember it. Are they going to turn out well?
"Yes, they are going to turn out beautifully! You are going to have wonderful memories. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later, dear seeker!"
